name: Spoop
content: I do not have eyes, but once I did see. I had thoughts, but now I am empty. What am I?

name: Feet
content: The more you take, the more of me there are. What am I?

name: Stalker
content: I will follow you all day, but will perish in the midday sun. What am I?

name: Common
content: What do mummies, witches, zombies, and vampires have in common?

name: Aliens
content: Why did the alien couple break up?

name: Everywhere
content: I surround you and am everywhere, yet I take up no space. What am I?

name: Rocks
content: Large as a mountain, small as a pea, Endlessly swimming in a waterless sea. What am I?

name: Time
content: From the beginning of eternity to the end of time, what am I?

name: Furniture1
content: I have four legs, but I never walk. I have a back, but I cannot talk. What am I?

name: Furniture2
content: I have a head but never weep. I never run, even though I have feet. What am I?

name: Cool
content: I have hands and it's cool to be with me. What am I?

name: Guard
content: I neither bark nor do I bite. I prevent entry without a fight. What am I?

name: Pop
Shift
CopyWithin
Splice
PadStart
Split
At
Slice 'n Replace
Absolute Value
Square Root
Floor
Ceiling
